summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Reports module. All backend APIs (15/15 tests passed) and frontend features working correctly. Reports page displays 6 report cards with charts, date range filter works, CSV export functional, sidebar navigation order correct.
critical_code_review_comments: Reports.js line 114: ESLint warning about missing 'fetchReports' dependency in useEffect - minor, not breaking
seed_data_creation: Created test user and session for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Reports module fully tested. Backend endpoints /api/reports and /api/reports/export/{type} all working. Frontend Reports page at /reports displays 6 report cards (Pipeline por Etapa, Leads por Fuente, Leads por Sector, Servicios Demandados, Leads por Propietario, Motivos de Pérdida). Date range filter (Este mes, Este trimestre, Este año, Personalizado) works. CSV export buttons work for all 6 reports. Dark mode dropdown styling verified with correct colors (Slate 400 placeholder, Slate 200 selected, Slate 800 background, Slate 700 hover).
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/reports returns 200 with all 6 aggregation fields
Backend: GET /api/reports with date filter works
Frontend: All 6 report cards displayed with charts
Frontend: Date range filter dropdown works (4 options)
Frontend: Custom date range shows date inputs
Frontend: CSV export buttons work (6 buttons, toast notification)
Frontend: Sidebar shows 'Reportes' between Pipeline and Admin
Frontend: Dark mode dropdown styling correct (Slate 400/200/800/700)
